2COR 7.14 unte jabai ƕa imma fram izwis ƕaiƕop, ni gaaiwiskoþs warþ;
ak swaswe allata izwis in sunjai rodidedum, swa jah ƕoftuli unsara so du Teitau sunja warþ.
2COR 7.15 jabbrusts is ufarassau du izwis sind, gamunandins þo allaize izwara ufhausein, swe miþ agisa jah reirom andnemuþ ina.
2COR 7.16 fagino nu, unte in allamma gatraua in izwis.

2COR 8.1 Aþþan kannja izwis, broþrjus, anst gudis þo gibanon in aikklesjom Makidonais, 2COR 8.2 þatei in managamma kustau aglons managduþs fahedais ize jaþþata diupo unledi ize usmanagnoda du gabein ainfalþeins ize.
2COR 8.3 unte bi mahtai, weitwodja, jah ufar maht silbawiljos wesun, 2COR 8.4 miþ managai usbloteinai bidjandans uns niman anst seina jah gamainein andbahtjis in þans weihans.

2COR 8.5 jaþni swaswe wenidedum, ak sik silbans atgebun frumist fraujin, þaþroþþan uns þairh wiljan gudis, 2COR 8.6 swaei bedeima Teitaun, ei swaswe faura dustodida, swah ustiuhai in izwis jah þo anst.
2COR 8.7 akei swe raihtis in allamma managniþ, galaubeinai jah waurda jah kunþja jah in allai usdaudein jah ana þizai us izwis in uns frijaþwai, ei jah in þizai anstai managnaiþ.
2COR 8.8 ni swaswe fraujinonds qiþa izwis, ak in þizos anþaraize usdaudeins jah izwaraizos frijaþwos airkniþa kiusands.
2COR 8.9 unte kunnuþ anst fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, þatei in izwara gaunledida sik gabigs wisands, ei jus þamma is unledja gabigai wairþaiþ.
unte þata izwis batizo ist, juzei ni þatainei taujan, ak jah wiljan dugunnuþ af fairnin jera.
2COR 8.11 iþ nu sai, jah taujan ustiuhaiþ, ei swaswe fauraïst muns du wiljan, swa jah du ustiuhan us þammei habaiþ.
2COR 8.12 jabai auk wilja in gagreftai ist, swaswe habai, waila andanem ist, ni swaswe ni habai.
2COR 8.13 ni swa auk ei anþaraim iusila, iþ izwis aglo, ak us ibnassau;
2COR 8.14 in þamma nu mela izwar ufarassus du jainaize þarbom, ei jah jainaize ufarassus wairþai du izwaraim þarbom, ei wairþai ibnassus, 2COR 8.15 swaswe gameliþ ist:
jassaei filu, ni managizo, jah saei leitil, ni fawizo.
2COR 8.16 aþþan awiliuþ guda, ize gaf þo samon usdaudein faur izwis in hairto Teitaus;
2COR 8.17 unte raihtis bida andnam, aþþan usdaudoza wisands silba wiljands galaiþ du izwis.
2COR 8.18 ga-sandidedum-h-þan-miþ imma broþar; þizei hazeins in aiwaggeljons and allos aikklesjons.

2COR 8.19 aþþan ni þat-ain, ak jah gatewiþs fram aikklesjom miþ gasinþam uns miþ anstai þizai andbahtidon fram uns du fraujins wulþau jah gairnein unsarai; 2COR 8.20 biwandjandans þata, ibai ƕas uns fairinodedi in digrein þizai andbahtidon fram uns;
2COR 8.21 garedandans auk goda ni þatainei in andwairþja gudis, ak jah in andwairþja manne.
2COR 8.22 insandidedum þan miþ im broþar unsarana þanei gakausidedum in managaim ufta usdaudana wisandan, aþþan nu, sai, filu usdaudozan trauainai managai in izwis;
2COR 8.23 jah þe bi Teitu, saei ist gaman mein jaggawaurstwa in izwis;
jaþþe broþrjus unsarai apaustauleis aikklesjono, wulþaus Xristaus.
2COR 8.24 aþþan ustaiknein frijaþwos izwaraizos jah unsaraizos ƕoftuljos faur izwis in im ustaiknjandans in andwairþja aikklesjono.
2COR 9.1 Aþþan bi andbahti þatei rahtoda du weihaim, ufjo mis ist du meljan izwis;
2COR 9.2 unte wait gairnein izwara, þizaiei fram izwis ƕopam at Makidonim, unte Akaja gamanwida ist fram fairnin jera, jah þata us izwis aljan uswagida þans managistans.

2COR 9.3 aþþan fauragasandida broþruns, ei ƕoftuli unsara so fram izwis ni waurþi lausa in þizai halbai, ei swaswe qaþ gamanwidai sijaiþ; 2COR 9.4 ibai jabai qimand miþ mis Makidoneis jagbigitand izwis unmanwjans, gaaiwiskondau weis, ei ni qiþau jus, in þamma stomin ƕoftuljos.
